orderform.set_price_bid: Set price to current highest bid
orderform.set_price_ask: Set price to current lowest ask
orderform.order_total_desc: Approximate {{quoteCcy}} equivalent of this order at the limit price
orderform.postonly_desc: "Post Only" limit orders are orders that allow you to be sure to always pay the maker fee. When placed, a "Post Only" limit order is either inserted into the order book or cancelled.
orderform.buy_price_out_of_range: Price cannot be more than {{priceDeltaPercent}}% of the top ask price ({{maxPrice}})
orderform.sell_price_out_of_range: Price cannot be less than {{priceDeltaPercent}}% of the top bid price ({{maxPrice}})
orderform.tif_desc: Time-In-Force: specify datetime for automatic order cancellation.

grid.tip: Drag or resize the grid components to change the layout

deposits.title: Deposit
deposits.daemon_down: The {{currency}} watchonly daemon is restarting, please come back in a few minutes
deposits.send_to_eth_warning_1: At this time Bitfinex does not support Ethereum transactions generated from
deposits.send_to_eth_warning_3: . To avoid missing deposits or deposit delays ETH and ETC should only be sent in traditional transactions.
deposits.send_to_eth_more: If you are uncertain that your deposit will not be sent as part of an Ethereum contract execution, please find out for sure before sending your deposit.

warnings.send_to_eth_1: At this time Bitfinex does not accept transactions sent from
warnings.iota_deposit_once_1: Important: IOTA deposit addresses should not be used more than once. After the first use of a deposit address, subsequent deposits to the same address
warnings.deposit_add_change_1: You can generate new deposit addresses using the [
warnings.deposit_add_change2: When you generate a new deposit address, the old address is still valid for accepting deposits.
warnings.send_paymend_id: Sending {{ccy}} requires both an address and a {{type}}. The {{type}} for each of your wallets is displayed in the table below.
warnings.payment_id_extra1: WARNING: Failure to follow correct {{term}} deposit procedure will result in lost deposits.
warnings.payment_id_extra2: Depositing {{term}} to Bitfinex requires BOTH a deposit address and a deposit {{field}}.
warnings.payment_id_extra3: To make a {{term}} deposit, you need to use both
warnings.payment_id_extra4: On the following page, the deposit address is shown at the top, and then below you will see a deposit {{field}} for each of your wallets.
warnings.payment_id_extra5: To make a deposit to your Exchange wallet, for example, you will need to use the deposit address shown near the top and the deposit {{field}} next to your Exchange wallet.
warnings.payment_id_extra6: Do NOT send {{term}} to Bitfinex unless you know how to indicate a {{field}}.
warnings.payment_id_extra7: If you fail to include the {{field}} with your deposit the funds will be lost forever.
warnings.erc20_only: Bitfinex supports ERC20 version of {{currency}} only. Do not deposit the new mainnet {{label}} tokens.
warnings.bch: Depositing anything other than {{label}} WILL RESULT IN LOSS OF FUNDS. Bitfinex currently is not supporting automated chain splits. It is your responsibility to ensure you only deposit {{label}} to this address.
warnings.send_to_ccy: Please do not send Ethereum, Tron, or any other currency to these addresses. They will not be credited.

deposits.send_to1: Please send {{currency}} to one of your deposit {{name}} displayed below.
deposits.send_to2: The deposit will be credited in your corresponding wallet.
deposits.deposit_add_change_payid_1: You can generate a new deposit {{type}} using the [
deposits.deposit_add_change_payid_2: ] buttons below. When you generate a new deposit {{type}}, the old {{type}} is still valid for accepting deposits.
deposits.send_to_invoice: Please enter an amount, select a wallet, and use the [Generate Invoice] button to generate an invoice for {{currency}}.
deposits.scan_invoice: Scan the QR code below with your favorite Lightning wallet
deposits.contact_support_2: if you have any questions or concerns.
deposits.no_active_tether: No active tether protocols for deposits. Please try again.
deposits.send_tether_protocol: Tethers can be sent on multiple transport protocols. Please select a transport protocol below to reveal the corresponding deposit addresses.
deposits.send_to_tether: Please send assets to one of your Tether deposit addresses displayed below. The deposit will be credited in your corresponding wallet.
deposits.address_limit: You have reached the limit of new deposit addresses per month
deposits.ampl_deposit_warning: Please note, any deposits confirmed during the AMPL rebase (approximately from 01:50 am to 02:20 am UTC daily) will require manual processing and will be charged a fee - please see <0>the Ampleforth Support Article</0>.

withdrawals.available_balance_explain: If you have limit orders, this will decrease your available balance. To increase it, you can cancel limit orders
withdrawals.no_payment_id_info_1: In some unusual situations a {{type}} is not needed when withdrawing {{ccy}}.
withdrawals.no_payment_id_info_2: Please do not check this box unless you are

withdrawals.invalid_payment_request: Invoice is not a proper lightning payment request
withdrawals.tether_warning1: Please confirm that you are sending tethers to a
withdrawals.tether_warning2: Tethers sent to a non-Tether compatible address may be non-retrievable by the recipient.

warnings.erc20_only: Bitfinex supports ERC20 version of {{currency}} only. Do not withdraw to a new mainnet {{label}} wallet.

movements.tether_info_xaut_new: Tether Gold (XAUt) is a digital token backed by physical gold. One full XAUt token represents one troy fine ounce of gold on a London Good Delivery bar.
movements.tether_info_new: Tether's blockchain-enabled platform allows you to transact with real-world currency like bitcoin. Store, send, and receive 1-to-1 backed digital currency across Tether integrated exchanges, platforms, and wallets.

errors.invalid_invoice_amount: Invoice amount must be greater than or equal to {{min}} and less than or equal to {{max}}

movements.not_active_or_supported: {{currency}} {{type}} are currently not active or not supported.

iota_notice.part1: IOTA is different than other major cryptocurrencies in several important ways.
iota_notice.part2: Before using IOTA on Bitfinex, please review the following critical items.
